long_description: With a full-length center channel and a supportive shape, the SMP Stratos saddle is well-suited to intensive training or recreational riding. Long-lasting, abrasion-resistant full-grain leather cover ensures ultimate comfort and dependable performance through the miles. Saddle shape features a full-length central channel to help redistribute body weight off of sensitive areas; raised rear offers added support for pelvis. Foamed elastomer padding is strategically placed to add comfort. Stainless-steel rails offer a sturdy and supportive platform. SMP Stratos saddle works well with a narrow or medium-size pelvis.
short_description: With a full-length center channel and a supportive shape, the SMP Stratos saddle is well-suited to intensive training or recreational riding.
